description:
Your stats have been increased based on your skills:
STRENGTH increased by Mechanics, Athletics, Bashing Weapons, Cutting Weapons, Melee, and Throwing.
DEXTERITY increased by Driving, Survival, Tailoring, Devices, Dodging, Piercing Weapons, and Unarmed.
INTELLIGENCE increased by Computers, Cooking, Electronics, Fabrication, Health Care, Social, and Applied Science.
PERCEPTION increased by Archery, Marksmanship, Launchers, Handguns, Rifles, Shotguns, and Submachine Guns.

math: max((u_skill('mechanics') + u_skill('swimming') + u_skill('bashing') + u_skill('cutting') + u_skill('melee') + u_skill('throw')) * 0.4 - 3, 0)
max((u_skill('driving') + u_skill('survival') + u_skill('tailor') + u_skill('traps') + u_skill('dodge') + u_skill('stabbing') + u_skill('unarmed')) * 0.4 - 3, 0)
max((u_skill('computer') + u_skill('cooking') + u_skill('electronics') + u_skill('fabrication') + u_skill('firstaid') + u_skill('speech') + u_skill('chemistry')) * 0.4 - 3, 0)
max((u_skill('archery') + u_skill('gun') + u_skill('launcher') + u_skill('pistol') + u_skill('rifle') + u_skill('shotgun') + u_skill('smg')) * 0.4 - 3, 0)
